formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..n, sum(i=0..n/2-k, binomial(n,2*i+k)*((sum(j=0..2*i, stirling2(2*i+k,j+k)*2^(-j+2*i-1)*binomial(j+k-1,k-1)*(j+k)!*(-1)^(i+j)))*stirling1(n-2*i-k,k)))), n>0, a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 01 2011a(n) ~ n! * (-1)^n * n^(tan(1)-1) / GAMMA(tan(1)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
mathematica: Exp[ Tan[ x ]*Log[ 1+x ] ]CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x)^Tan[x], {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_
